sentence: Kidde Fire Safety, a part of United Technologies Corp. 's UTX UTC Building & Industrial Systems, recently launched the RemoteLync Monitor exclusively at The Home Depot, Inc HD stores and online for $99.

RemoteLync Monitor is a listening security device, which uses patented technology to distinguish smoke and carbon monoxide (CO) alarm warnings from background noise and is ideal for residences or domestic properties.

The new monitor plugs into a single outlet, listens for the unique beeping pattern of existing alarms, and uses a home's existing wireless Internet connection to contact homeowners if an alarm sounds.
The RemoteLync Monitor operates as a standalone device and does not require any installation or additional costs.
The notifications require a simple, user-friendly setup and can be sent as a text message, email, or on a free iOS or Android compatible application.

Kidde has been an expert for over a century in addressing issues regarding home safety and these smart solutions enable consumers to remain in control and get instant notifications in case of any untoward risks.
United Technologies, the parent company of Kidde, provides high-end technology products and services to building systems and aerospace industries worldwide.
This diversified business conglomerate serves various end markets such as aerospace, defense and commercial construction.
The business diversification allows the company to remain profitable during tough economic times.
United Technologies currently has a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).
Other stocks that look promising and are worth a look include RBC Bearings Inc ROLL and Broadcom Corp BRCM , both carrying a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy).
